title: RIVENDELL UNDER SIEGE - Third Age Total War Gameplay
description:
Third Age Total War Gameplay - Rivendell is under siege by the the free peoples of Eriador!  Will the Elves hold out?  Or will the Free Peoples be victories!  This is another epic battle in Middle Earth!  Enjoy :D


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
